languages.text: "У нас нет доказательств, что это одни и те же наемники. Враг хорошо заметает следы, и нам тоже надо быть осторожными".
"We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."
languages.original_text: "У нас нет доказательств, что это одни и те же наемники. Враг хорошо заметает следы, и нам тоже надо быть осторожными".

traits.locale_text: "We have no evidence to suggest that those are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with just as much caution."
"We have no evidence to suggest that those are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with just as much caution."
"We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."
"We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."
"We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."
"We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."

languages.text: 「同一の傭兵であるという証拠は今のところ存在しません。敵は痕跡を消すのが得意ですので、私たちもそれ相応の慎重さをもって行動すべきです」
languages.original_text: "We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."

traits.locale_text: 「同一の傭兵であるという証拠は今のところ存在しません。敵は痕跡を消すのが得意ですので、私たちもそれ相応の慎重さをもって行動すべきです」

languages.text: "Wir haben keinen Beweis dafür, dass es sich um dieselben Söldner handelt. Unser Feind ist gut darin, seine Spuren zu verwischen, daher sollten wir ebenfalls umsichtig vorgehen."
languages.original_text: "We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben keinen Beweis dafür, dass es sich um dieselben Söldner handelt. Unser Feind ist gut darin, seine Spuren zu verwischen, daher sollten wir ebenfalls umsichtig vorgehen."

languages.text: « Nous n'avons aucune preuve qu'il s'agit des mêmes mercenaires. Notre adversaire sait parfaitement comment dissimuler ses traces, nous devrions agir avec prudence. »
languages.original_text: "We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'avons aucune preuve qu'il s'agit des mêmes mercenaires. Notre adversaire sait parfaitement comment dissimuler ses traces, nous devrions agir avec prudence. »

languages.text: «No tenemos pruebas que sugieran que son los mismos mercenarios. A nuestro enemigo se le da bien ocultar su rastro, así que deberíamos proceder con cautela».
languages.original_text: "We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."

traits.locale_text: «No tenemos pruebas que sugieran que son los mismos mercenarios. A nuestro enemigo se le da bien ocultar su rastro, así que deberíamos proceder con cautela».

languages.text: “目前没有证据表明这两批人是同一伙雇佣兵。我们的敌人非常擅长掩盖踪迹，因此我们也同样应该小心行事。”
languages.original_text: "We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."

traits.locale_text: “目前没有证据表明这两批人是同一伙雇佣兵。我们的敌人非常擅长掩盖踪迹，因此我们也同样应该小心行事。”

languages.text: "Bu askerlerin aynı paralı askerler olduklarını gösteren hiçbir kanıtımız yok. Düşmanımız izlerini örtmekte usta. Bu yüzden aynı derecede ihtiyat göstererek ilerlemeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."

traits.locale_text: "Bu askerlerin aynı paralı askerler olduklarını gösteren hiçbir kanıtımız yok. Düşmanımız izlerini örtmekte usta. Bu yüzden aynı derecede ihtiyat göstererek ilerlemeliyiz."

languages.original_text: "We have no evidence to suggest that they are the same mercenaries. Our enemy is good at covering their tracks, so we should proceed with equal caution."
